title: Paris/5th arrondissement
name: Latin Quarter Curios Photo Tour
content: From humble church to towering cathedral, Notre Dame is the world-famous jewel in the crown of the Ile de la Cite, the original Paris before the city outgrew its island boundaries. This whole area is steeped in history and secrets just waiting to be discovered. Tour will enter the moving and visually stunning monument to the deportation, roam the banks of the river and the twisting backstreets, and investigate the legendary Latin Quarter with cameras on an "adventure thru the lens".
